Bash(timeout 90 docker exec banana-slides-backend /app/.venv/bin/python3 -c "
from openai import OpenAI
import requests
import time
import re

client = OpenAI\(api_key=''sk-KxtYinRpTCoGr93Ca7LZQY4ukgpJmxEnimSh5kEZR4oj1Yjh'', base_url=''https://521api.com/v1''\)

print\(''生成简单图片...''\)
r = client.chat.completions.create\(
    model=''gemini-3-pro-image-preview-2k'',
    messages=[{''role'': ''user'', ''content'': [{''type'': ''text'', ''text'': ''A simple blue square''}]}],
    modalities=[''text'', ''image'']
\)

content = r.choices[0].message.content
match = re.search\(r''https?://[^\\s\\\)]+'', content\)
if match:
    url = match.group\(0\)
    print\(f''URL: {url[:60]}...''\)
    print\(''下载...''\)
    start = time.time\(\)
    img = requests.get\(url, timeout=120\)
    elapsed = time.time\(\) - start
    size = len\(img.content\)
    print\(f''✅ 成功! {size} bytes in {elapsed:.1f}s = {size/elapsed/1024/1024:.2f} MB/s''\)
else:
    print\(''无URL''\)
")
